00041 #include "pizFiniteState.h"

00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00046 #define PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE                       128
00047 #define PIZ_BOUNDED_QUEUE_SIZE                  4
00048 #define PIZ_INCREMENT_JUMP_CHANCE               1   
00049 #define PIZ_INCREMENT_FINAL_JUMP_CHANCE         5 
00050 #define PIZ_MAXIMUM_THRESHOLD_TO_MERGE_NODES    100
00051 
00052 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_TO_MERGE_NODES    35
00053 
00054 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 
00057 #include <stdlib.h>
00058 #include <math.h>
00059 #include <time.h>
00060 
00061 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 
00064 PIZFiniteState *pizFiniteStateNew (long argc, long *argv)
00065 {
00066     PIZFiniteState *x = NULL;
00067 
00068     if (x = (PIZFiniteState *)malloc (sizeof(PIZFiniteState))) {
00069     
00070         long i;
00071         long err = PIZ_GOOD;
00072         
00073         if (x->stock = (PIZFiniteStateNode *)malloc (PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE * sizeof(PIZFiniteStateNode))) {
00074             x->count                    = 0;
00075             x->shuttle                  = -1;
00076             x->jumpChance               = 0;
00077             x->thresholdToMergeNodes    = PIZ_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD_TO_MERGE_NODES;
00078             
00079             srand ((unsigned int)time(NULL));
00080                 
00081             if (argc && ((argv[0] > 0)  && (argv[0] <= PIZ_MAXIMUM_THRESHOLD_TO_MERGE_NODES))) {
00082                     x->thresholdToMergeNodes = argv[0];
00083                 }
00084             
00085             if (x->ticketMachine = pizBoundedStackNew (PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE)) {
00086                 for (i = (PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE - 1); i >= 0; i--) {
00087                      pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, i);
00088                  }
00089             } else {
00090                 err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00091             }
00092             
00093             if (x->lottery = (long *)malloc ((MAX (PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE, PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE)) * sizeof(long))) {
00094                 x->lotteryIndex = 0;
00095             } else {
00096                 err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00097             }
00098                 
00099             if (x->mapByValue = (PIZBoundedQueue **)malloc (PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE * sizeof(PIZBoundedQueue *))) {
00100                 for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE; i++) {
00101                     if (!(x->mapByValue[i] = pizBoundedQueueNew (PIZ_BOUNDED_QUEUE_SIZE))) {
00102                             err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00103                         }
00104                 }
00105             } else {
00106                 err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00107             }
00108             
00109             if (err)  {
00110                 pizFiniteStateFree (x);
00111                 x = NULL;
00112             }
00113                 
00114         } else {
00115             free (x);
00116             x = NULL;
00117         }
00118     }
00119     
00120     return x;
00121 }
00122 
00123 void pizFiniteStateFree (PIZFiniteState *x)
00124 {
00125     if (x) {
00126         if (x->mapByValue) {
00127             long i;
00128 
00129             for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE; i++) {
00130                     pizBoundedQueueFree (x->mapByValue[i]);
00131                     x->mapByValue[i] = NULL;
00132                 }
00133             
00134             free (x->mapByValue);
00135             x->mapByValue = NULL;
00136         }
00137 
00138         pizBoundedStackFree (x->ticketMachine);
00139         x->ticketMachine = NULL;
00140         
00141         free (x->lottery);
00142         
00143         free (x->stock);
00144         x->stock = NULL;
00145         
00146         free (x);
00147     }
00148 }

00153 PIZError pizFiniteStateAdd (PIZFiniteState *x, long argc, long *argv)
00154 {
00155     long err1 = PIZ_ERROR;
00156     long err2 = PIZ_GOOD;
00157     
00158     if (argv && argc > 0) {
00159     
00160         err1 = PIZ_GOOD;            
00161 
00162         if (!pizBoundedStackPop (x->ticketMachine)) {
00163             long i;
00164             long nextNode;
00165             long firstNode = pizBoundedStackPoppedValue (x->ticketMachine);
00166             long k = CLAMP (argv[0], 0, (PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE - 1));
00167             
00168             if (!pizBoundedQueueAppend (x->mapByValue[k], firstNode)) {
00169                 x->count ++;
00170                 
00171                 x->stock[firstNode].value = k;
00172                 x->stock[firstNode].final = true;
00173                 pizItemset128Clear (&(x->stock[firstNode].parents));
00174                 pizItemset128Clear (&(x->stock[firstNode].childs));
00175                 
00176                 for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00177                     if (!pizBoundedStackPop (x->ticketMachine)) {
00178                     
00179                         nextNode = pizBoundedStackPoppedValue (x->ticketMachine);
00180                         k = CLAMP (argv[i], 0, (PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE - 1));
00181                                 
00182                         if (!pizBoundedQueueAppend (x->mapByValue[k], nextNode)) {
00183                             x->count ++;
00184                             
00185                             x->stock[nextNode].value = k;
00186                             x->stock[nextNode].final = true;
00187                             
00188                             pizItemset128Clear (&(x->stock[nextNode].parents));
00189                             pizItemset128Clear (&(x->stock[nextNode].childs));
00190                             
00191                             pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&(x->stock[nextNode].parents), firstNode);
00192                             
00193                             x->stock[firstNode].final = false;
00194                             
00195                             pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&(x->stock[firstNode].childs), nextNode);
00196                             
00197                             firstNode = nextNode;
00198                         } else {
00199                             pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, nextNode);
00200                             err1 = PIZ_MEMORY;
00201                         }
00202                     }
00203                 }
00204             } else {
00205                 pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, firstNode);
00206                 err1 = PIZ_MEMORY;
00207             }
00208         }
00209         
00210         while ((x->count > x->thresholdToMergeNodes) && !err2) {
00211                 err2 = pizFiniteStateMergeNodes (x);
00212             }
00213     }
00214     
00215     return err1;
00216 }
00217 
00218 void pizFiniteStateClear (PIZFiniteState *x)
00219 {
00220     long i;
00221     
00222     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE; i++) {
00223             pizBoundedQueueClear (x->mapByValue[i]);
00224         }
00225         
00226     x->count        = 0;
00227     x->shuttle      = -1;
00228     x->jumpChance   = 0;
00229     
00230     pizBoundedStackClear (x->ticketMachine);
00231     
00232     for (i = (PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE - 1); i >= 0; i--) {
00233             pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, i);
00234         }
00235 }
00236 
00237 PIZError pizFiniteStateProceed (PIZFiniteState *x, long argc, long *argv)
00238 {
00239     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00240     
00241     if (((argc > 0) && argv) && (x->count > 0)) {
00242     
00243         long k = 0;
00244         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00245         
00246         while (argc) {
00247             long i;
00248             bool jump = false;
00249             
00250             if (x->shuttle == -1) {
00251                 long a, j, h ;
00252                 
00253                 x->lotteryIndex = 0;
00254 
00255                 for (j = 0; j < PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE; j++) {
00256                     if (pizBoundedQueueCount (x->mapByValue[j])) {
00257                             x->lottery[x->lotteryIndex] = j;
00258                             x->lotteryIndex ++;
00259                         }
00260                     }
00261                 
00262                 h = (long)(x->lotteryIndex * (rand ( ) / (RAND_MAX + 1.0)));
00263 
00264                 pizBoundedQueuePop (x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]]);
00265                 a = pizBoundedQueuePoppedValue (x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]]);
00266                 x->shuttle = a;
00267                 pizBoundedQueueAppend ((x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]]), a);
00268             }
00269             
00270             argv[k] = x->stock[x->shuttle].value;
00271             
00272             argc --;
00273             k ++;
00274             
00275             x->lotteryIndex = 0;
00276             
00277             jump = ((100 * (rand ( ) / (RAND_MAX + 1.0))) < x->jumpChance);
00278             
00279             if (!jump) {
00280                 for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; i++) {
00281                     if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&(x->stock[x->shuttle].childs), i)) {
00282                             x->lottery[x->lotteryIndex] = i;
00283                             x->lotteryIndex ++;
00284                         }
00285                     }
00286                 }
00287             
00288             if (x->lotteryIndex) {
00289                 long h = (long)(x->lotteryIndex * (rand ( ) / (RAND_MAX + 1.0)));
00290                 x->shuttle = x->lottery[h];
00291                 
00292                 if (x->stock[x->shuttle].final) {
00293                     x->jumpChance += PIZ_INCREMENT_FINAL_JUMP_CHANCE;
00294                 } else {
00295                     x->jumpChance += PIZ_INCREMENT_JUMP_CHANCE;
00296                 }
00297             } else {
00298                 x->shuttle      = -1;
00299                 x->jumpChance   = 0;
00300             }
00301         }
00302     }
00303     
00304     return err;
00305 }
00306 
00307 long pizFiniteStateCount (const PIZFiniteState *x)
00308 {
00309     return (x->count);
00310 }

00312 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00313 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00314 
00315 PIZ_INLINE PIZError pizFiniteStateMergeNodes (PIZFiniteState *x)
00316 {
00317     long i;
00318     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00319     
00320     x->lotteryIndex = 0;
00321     
00322     for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ALPHABET_SIZE; i++) {
00323         if (pizBoundedQueueCount (x->mapByValue[i])) {
00324             long j;
00325             
00326             for (j = 0; j < pizBoundedQueueCount (x->mapByValue[i]); j++) {
00327                     x->lottery[x->lotteryIndex] = i;
00328                     x->lotteryIndex ++;
00329                 }
00330             }
00331         }
00332             
00333     if (x->lotteryIndex) {
00334     
00335         long h = (long)(x->lotteryIndex * (rand ( ) / (RAND_MAX + 1.0)));
00336         
00337         if (pizBoundedQueueCount (x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]]) == 1) {
00338         
00339             long j, a;
00340             
00341             x->count --;
00342             
00343             pizBoundedQueuePop (x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]]);
00344             a = pizBoundedQueuePoppedValue (x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]]);
00345             
00346             for (j = 0; j < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; j++) {
00347                 if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&(x->stock[a].parents), j)) {
00348                         pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&(x->stock[j].childs), a);
00349                     }
00350                 
00351                 if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&(x->stock[a].childs), j)) {
00352                         pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&(x->stock[j].parents), a);
00353                     }
00354                 }
00355             
00356             pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, a);
00357             
00358             if (x->shuttle == a) {
00359                     x->shuttle = -1;
00360                 }
00361             
00362             err = PIZ_GOOD;
00363             
00364         } else {
00365             long            j;
00366             long            a, b;
00367             PIZItemset128   tempChilds;
00368             PIZItemset128   tempParents;
00369             
00370             x->count --;
00371             
00372             pizBoundedQueuePop (x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]]);
00373             a = pizBoundedQueuePoppedValue (x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]]);
00374             pizBoundedQueuePopLastValue (x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]]);
00375             b = pizBoundedQueuePoppedValue (x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]]);
00376             
00377             pizItemset128Union (&(x->stock[a].childs), &(x->stock[b].childs), &tempChilds);
00378             pizItemset128Union (&(x->stock[a].parents), &(x->stock[b].parents), &tempParents);
00379             
00380             x->stock[a].final   = x->stock[a].final || x->stock[b].final;
00381             
00382             x->stock[a].childs  = tempChilds;
00383             x->stock[a].parents = tempParents;
00384             
00385             for (j = 0; j < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; j++) {
00386                 if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&(x->stock[b].parents), j)) {
00387                         pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&(x->stock[j].childs), b);
00388                         pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&(x->stock[j].childs), a);
00389                     }
00390                 
00391                 if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&(x->stock[b].childs), j)) {
00392                         pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&(x->stock[j].parents), b);
00393                         pizItemset128SetAtIndex (&(x->stock[j].parents), a);
00394                     }
00395                 }
00396             
00397             pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&(x->stock[a].parents), a);
00398             pizItemset128UnsetAtIndex (&(x->stock[a].childs), a);
00399             
00400             pizBoundedQueueAppend (x->mapByValue[x->lottery[h]], a);
00401             
00402             pizBoundedStackPush (x->ticketMachine, b);
00403             
00404             if (x->shuttle == b) {
00405                     x->shuttle = a;
00406                 }
00407                 
00408             err = PIZ_GOOD;
00409         }
00410     }
00411     
00412     return err; 
00413 }
